Name: Port Pirie Regional Library Service, Local History Collection

About.Hours & facilities: Open Tues 10am-8pm, Wed 12noon-6pm, Thurs 10am-8pm, Fri 10am-6pm, Sat 9am-1pm, Sun 12noon-4pm; closed Mon and public holidays. General reference assistance available. General copying services available.

About.Acquisition focus: To acquire records relating to the town of Port Pirie and the surrounding districts including those about individuals, businesses, organisations etc.
